data.name: RealityMinds:Popular Fantasy Monster Pack
data.detailed_description:
This is a collection of monster images by illustrator Yutaro Tsuyuki.
You can use the monsters that appear in RealityMinds in your own work.

*********************************************************
Features:
* Bat, bee, crab, fairie, hedgehog, flower, mushroom, slime, tentacle, rock, demon, crystal dragon, etc(Figures are not included)
* 37 sets
* front view/ side-view
* large size（186 × 184 ～ 350 × 414）,small size（122 × 120 ～ 228 × 268 ）
*********************************************************

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 615Graphics or better
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
